alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 4:04PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Bradford, Baker, northern Union, northeastern Columbia and eastern Hamilton Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 404 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Suwannee Valley to near Lulu. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Taylor, Palestine Community, Five Points, Watertown, Lulu, Olustee, Sanderson and Ellerbee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union
